document.full_text: tokyo electric power co  should go through a court-led restructuring similar to japan airlines, the head of the tokyo bourse was quoted as saying, sending the utility's stock tumbling to an all-time low on the possibility of a delisting.
document.title: tse head recommends court-led tepco restructuring, stock dives
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co  should go through a court-led restructuring similar to japan airlines, the head of the tokyo bourse was quoted as saying, sending the utility's stock tumbling to an all-time low on the possibility of a delisting.
